mapper.update:
UPDATE so_sign_config
order_status = #{orderStatus},
order_payment_status = #{orderPaymentStatus},
order_payment_type = #{orderPaymentType},
time_out = #{timeOut},
platform_id = #{platformId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
